#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define md 1000000007
inline int inp() {
    register int c = gc(); register int n=0; while(c < '0' || c > '9')c = gc();
    while(c >= '0' && c <= '9') {n = (n << 3) + (n << 1) + c - '0'; c = gc();}
    return n;
}
int main() {
	int t,n; double ans;
    t=inp();
    while(t--){
    	n=inp();
    	ans=100.0;
    	ans/=pow(n+1,1.0/n);
    	printf("%.8f\n", ans);	    
	}
    return 0;
}
